ashenlegacy.chat.first_start_message: Welcome to Ashen Legacy! We have friendly Discord community to chat, offer help and support, and share pics and videos.
ashenlegacy.chat.discord_link: Join the Ashen Legacy Discord community.§r
ashenlegacy.chat.update_notice: Thanks for alpha testing Ashen Legacy v0.01!§r  Please report any bugs you find to the Ashen Legacy Discord community.§r
ashenlegacy.tooltip.backpack: Contains 18 inventory slots and 1 upgrade slot.
ashenlegacy.tooltip.iron_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 2 upgrade slots.
ashenlegacy.tooltip.gold_backpack: Contains 36 inventory slots and 3 upgrade slots.
ashenlegacy.tooltip.diamond_backpack: Contains 54 inventory slots and 5 upgrade slots.
ashenlegacy.tooltip.netherite_backpack: Contains 72 inventory slots and 7 upgrade slots.
ashenlegacy.tooltip.not_implemented: This item is not yet fully implemented into Ashen Legacy.
ashenlegacy.information.minecraft.crafti: Firework stars are craftable with Gunpowder, any Dye, and optional Effect items (see the Minecraft Wiki).
sdm.pststage.stageunlock: You are required to ascend before selecting a sub-class.
